entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 4 except minus 7 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm over the Highlands. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4 except minus 7 over the Highlands. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
